attributes.action: stop british aid to the sudan goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the aftermath of the decision to jail gillian gibbons for 15 days, for allowing her class to name a teddy bear
muhammed, is this a culture that our money should be spent on

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
